verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O Lord, <WH3068> Thou didst show <WH7521> favor <WH7521> to Thy land; <WH776> Thou didst restore <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Jacob. <WH3290>
Thou didst forgive <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of Thy people; <WH5971> Thou didst cover <WH3680> all <WH3605> their sin. <WH9128> Selah. <WH5542>
Thou didst withdraw <WH622> all <WH3605> Thy fury; <WH5678> Thou didst turn <WH7725> away <WH7725> from Thy burning <WH2740> anger. <WH639>
Restore <WH7725> us, O God <WH430> of our salvation, <WH3468> And cause Thine indignation <WH3708> toward <WH5973> us to cease. <WH6565>
Wilt Thou be angry <WH599> with us forever <WH5769>? Wilt Thou prolong <WH4900> Thine anger <WH639> to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>?
Wilt Thou not Thyself <WH859> revive <WH2421> us again, <WH7725> That Thy people <WH5971> may rejoice <WH8055> in Thee?
Show <WH7200> us Thy lovingkindness, <WH2617> O Lord, <WH3068> And grant <WH5414> us Thy salvation. <WH3468>

I will hear <WH8085> what <WH4100> God <WH410> the Lord <WH3068> will say; <WH1696> For He will speak <WH1696> peace <WH7965> to His people, <WH5971> to His godly <WH2623> ones; <WH2623> But let them not turn <WH7725> back <WH7725> to folly. <WH3690>
Surely <WH389> His salvation <WH3468> is near <WH7138> to those who fear <WH3372> Him, That glory <WH9202> may dwell <WH7931> in our land. <WH776>
Lovingkindness <WH2617> and truth <WH571> have met <WH6298> together; Righteousness <WH6664> and peace <WH7965> have kissed <WH5401> each other.
Truth <WH571> springs <WH6779> from the earth; <WH776> And righteousness <WH6664> looks <WH8259> down <WH8259> from heaven. <WH8064>
Indeed, <WH1571> the Lord <WH3068> will give <WH5414> what <WH9185> is good; <WH9185> And our land <WH776> will yield <WH5414> its produce. <WH2981>
Righteousness <WH6664> will go <WH1980> before <WH6440> Him, And will make <WH7760> His footsteps <WH6471> into a way. <WH1870>
